sentences.sContent: The Buddhist kneels and hopes that the dog will not urinate at this hallowed moment.
sentences.sContent_eng: The Buddhist kneels and hopes that the dog will not urinate at this hallowed moment.
sentences.sCn: 佛教徒跪下来，心里暗自希望小狗不要在这个神圣的时刻撒尿。

sentences.sContent: And the child herself demonstrated her bladder control by flatly refusing to urinate in a plastic cup.
sentences.sContent_eng: And the child herself demonstrated her bladder control by flatly refusing to urinate in a plastic cup.
sentences.sCn: 而这个小孩拒绝在塑料杯中撒尿的行为也证明了她的膀胱控制能力。

trans.tranOther: to get rid of urine from your body
